review: It works as advertised. I have only had it for a week but so far its great.
author: Collins M Clark

review: Fire stick works just fine and was easy to install but there is little value to it since to have access to many shows and movies you still have to rent or purchase them even as a Prime member. Not cool! Not as presented!
author: Denise Burnham

review: We got a needed a new tv for our bedroom and wanted the option to watch Netflix, but didn't want to pay a lot of money for it. The Amazon Fire Stick is only $40, and saved us over $150 because we didn't have to buy a "smart tv". So far it's great, easy to operate and has lots of free shows and movies if you're a Prime member (which we are)
author: Samantha "Mom of 3"

review: easy to set up even for computer illiterate. Also like the remote- intuitive & easy. have nothing but good to say.
author: Nancy Ashmore

review: Everything is great, but it comes with little instructions.
author: Gregory Kump

review: Very easy to install it on the TV. I have not seen any film free for being prime customer, always appears a window that says that then can not see the movie. I could subscribe to Netflix and it is very good
author: G.Munoz

review: its great! quick and easy to use
author: Lillie Wilfong

review: YES IT'S GREAT.JUST TOOK ME A MINUTE TO CATCH ON,BUT I REALLY LIKE IT.
author: lisa mullins
